entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 70%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 70 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Snow level 1400 metres. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1 with risk of frost. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing after midnight. Snow level 1400 metres lowering to 1000 metres this evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 10.
